SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smartfarm.model.products

Class Product<T extends Product<T>>

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smartfarm.model.products.Product<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the product subclass extending Product (e.g., Egg, Milk, etc.).
Direct Known Subclasses:
Egg, Meat, Milk, Wool
public abstract class Product<T extends Product<T>> extends Object
This abstract class represents a generic Product with common attributes such as name, price, weight, and product type. The class is designed to be extended by specific product types like Egg, Milk, Meat, etc. It also defines an abstract method for creating a copy of the product with modified attributes.

    • copyWith

      public abstract T copyWith(String name, double price, int weight)
      Creates a copy of the current Product object with the specified name, price, and weight. This method must be implemented by subclasses to create a new instance of the specific product type.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name for the product.
      price - The new price for the product.
      weight - The new weight for the product.
      Returns:
      A new instance of the specific product type with the updated properties.
